website_summaries.verdict: Low-maintenance microwavable method of preparation. Attractive red color. It’s easy to clean this 100% silicone model.
pros: lets you add at least three eggs at a time plus vegetables
Won’t scratch from utensils, and omelet unsticks easily with spatula
Cleans easily in the dishwasher, and storage is simple
cons: Flipping required in multiple sessions of microwave cooking
Silicone is not equipped for conventional oven use

customer_reviews.title: Great for a traveler!
customer_reviews.text: Love this. I travel full time for my job so I use a microwave in hotels often. This device makes lovely, huge frittatas that I have any time of day. I use fresh veggies and cheeses and sometimes precooked meat or ham. I buy egg whites or scrambled eggs sold in cartons. Liquid egg whites take longer to cook but makes for a healthy option. Although it’s silicone, I spray a little coconut oil in one side when I steam the veggies and meats first because I like to have the healthy fat in there but you don’t need to. It can get a little cumbersome to flip over and clean but I feel this product is genius!
customer_reviews.author: Nomers

customer_reviews.title: A Cheese Omelet in Minutes! PLUS a tortilla warmer!!!!
customer_reviews.text: After some trial and error adjusting to my microwave, I finally nailed it! I use two eggs and seasonings with a splash of water to make a flat omelet. Cook it 2/3 the way through. Then sprinkle my cheese on top, fold the egg over, and cook the rest of the way. I do not flip the Lekue. PERFECT! 2-1-19 Just used this round Lekue to warm my 6" tortillas for dinner! Excellent!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carolee888

customer_reviews.title: Not Foolproof
customer_reviews.text: This is an interesting gadget. It does what it claims, but it is definitely not foolproof. It's really too large for a two-egg omelet, unless you fill it with lots of stuff. Since my wife won't eat an egg-white omelet, I'm stuck making single serving omelets. I should have saved money and bought the smaller half-round Lekue. On the positive side, it cooks quickly and is easy to clean, and it probably has wider uses I haven't discovered. The manual is microprint, but it is also available as a PDF online
customer_reviews.author: Robert Slone

customer_reviews.title: This is my new go to cookware!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased Dec2015. I love to cook omelets but hate having to pull out the pans and heat the stove. I cook everything in one pan which cleans up very quickly. MUST USE 800 (80%) POWER LEVEL! The recipes are great jumping off points and provide ideas regarding the cooking order and time. Be very careful when placing egg filled item into the microwave; I've spilled a few because it tends to get a little flimsy when hot.
customer_reviews.author: Mel S.

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly how I hoped
customer_reviews.text: I made the easiest and quickest frittata in my microwave. Came out perfect, better then baked, never thought I could get a from scratch frittata out of my microwave. I did use a lower power setting, so far my favorite microwave egg cooker
customer_reviews.author: Eric M. Schloegel Jr.

customer_reviews.title: great for all kinds of frittatas
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after using a friend's pan, and had to have it. I made a few of my favorite Persian frittatas and they came out perfectly! I am thrilled with the result. I bought additional ones and have recommended it to friends. Perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Farimah Schuerman

customer_reviews.title: I love making an omelet for several meals
customer_reviews.text: I love making an omelet for several meals. I use broccoli, carrots, green peppers, pico de gallo, spinach, celery, and two large eggs which provides me with, at-least four, separate meals.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Jackson

customer_reviews.title: So handy to have
customer_reviews.text: This Omelet maker is so handy to have. I have used it several times and each time it has given me a perfect omelet. I highly recommend this. 3-3-1/2 minutes in the microwave and it is done. Clean up is also a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: D. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a quick and easy Tortilla Española or Frittata!
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended by a friend who knows I love Tortilla Española. It works great -- so quick and easy! I love how easy it is to clean too. I still make the traditional recipe on the stove and oven from time to time, but I find that I use this more and more often because it is so easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Tortilla Espanola, indeed
customer_reviews.text: The tortilla does not come out golden/browned like when my father makes them in a skillet. However - the TEXTURE and TASTE are perfect. The extremely simple recipe provided works out perfectly. My own modifications work out perfectly. As soon as I'm done with this review, I'm going to order several more to give as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Phylis's daughter-in-law

customer_reviews.title: I love this design
customer_reviews.text: I found it great to do multiple types of egg items. easy to follow recipes.
customer_reviews.author: lorna

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I've only used mine once so far - I made a standard Spanish Omelette. I love it and will be using it more often. Making an Omelette in this, is super easy to do. I cooked mine in a standard oven, because I don't like microwaved food. I still flipped it over as suggested for microwave use and it was delicious. Also being silicone it was very easy to get the omelette onto a plate, in one piece, to serve. I'll be using this a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Dolan

customer_reviews.title: This cooks eggs beautifully. You are able to first cook veggies then ...
customer_reviews.text: This cooks eggs beautifully. You are able to first cook veggies then add the eggs, cheese, bacon, etc. So easy for something at work.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use, makes nice frittata
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Does not have the texture and color of regular omelet . Just took it on a hawaii vacation where we had a condo for a week. Used it 3-4 times for breakfast. We very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: This is a must have item. I have one ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have item. I have one in each of my homes Summer/Winter. I just spray it with olive oil and put some veggies inside. Microwave for a minutes. Add liquid egg whites and microwave. A very quick breakfast if you put the frittata on a tortilla to eat on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado RN

customer_reviews.title: Great product and so easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: I love to make tortillas Spanish style, but haven't had much luck making them turn out right until I purchased this. It is so easy to do with a great recipe included.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: make a healthy and tasty dish in a very short time
customer_reviews.text: every morning I will take a frozen fish and some fresh greens before going out. in lunch time the fish has be fully thawed, I'll salt it and drop a little bit olive oil(sometime some cheese, sometime lemon juice), and then mix the greens, a tasty dish will be done in 7-8min by the microwave. pls be attention that if u love strong smell in dishes, ex. basil or onion, the smell will be last for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Lu

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it, turns out tasty frittatas so simply. One dish, no mess, great meal.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: this thing is fantastic! Chop everything up, scramble the eggs, throw it in to this little silicon thing, and cook for 2 or 3 minutes. Bam!!! Almost perfect omelette.
customer_reviews.author: Boxertwin

customer_reviews.title: Fun Kitchen Gadget
customer_reviews.text: Its a fun kitchen gadget and the eggs do come out pretty well. Just don't over stuff it or it will make a huge mess.
customer_reviews.author: LeahC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: have trouble with stability with flipping the Frittata overall great product
customer_reviews.author: Aura Leigh

customer_reviews.title: The time saved and the tastes are excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Anything by Lekue is well worth the money! The time saved and the tastes are excellent!
customer_reviews.author: T. Meeker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for two
customer_reviews.text: I used this seveal times now and for two or more people, I much preferred it to the omelette maker. It comes out, thicker and moister. Perfect for two people. Cleans up easy in diswasher or sink.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch Samuels

customer_reviews.title: I have both this and the small omelet maker. ...
customer_reviews.text: I have both this and the small omelet maker. While they both work well, the smaller one is a little easier to open and close. The tether on this one can be a bit tricky.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gober

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised but because t is done in the microwave you don't get that little bit of crispiness that you would get from using the stove. It is well made and I like that it is free of PBA. I got one for my sister and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Frederick Adams

customer_reviews.title: Pale Faced Beauty.....
customer_reviews.text: however cooked to perfection. Zucchini, yellow squash, onion, farmer cheese and panchetta frittata moist and velvety duly executed with nary a snag. I gave it a tan with saffron and turmeric infused EVO.
customer_reviews.author: M. Beck

customer_reviews.title: don't know yet
customer_reviews.text: I need some in instructions in English & print big enough to read in order to use it.. Guess I will know then
customer_reviews.author: M. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: This is my first Lekue and it won't be my last
customer_reviews.text: Simple, tasty, and quick. Super easy. Great for two people. I love to cook from complicated to easy dishes. This omelet maker is pure genius in how easy it is to use and the results are delicious! However, the instructions are for an 800 watt microwave, if you have a higher watt microwave, which I do, I recommend you use a time conversion chart that I found on www.microwavecookingforone.com
customer_reviews.author: Pi-E

customer_reviews.title: Only really good Microwave Omlete maker I've found.
customer_reviews.text: I had bought microwave egg/omlete cookers before, and the others were not worth it. This one IS! I like to cook an omelet for a Saturday morning breakfast, but cooking for two, different meals can be too much work. With this, after prep, it's all unsupervised cooking. The directions they give with the included leaflet are easy to understand and work (you may have to adjust for your microwave oven wattage - it shows for a 1000W, mine is 1250W). It's easy and cooks the omelet to a "T". I am very happy with this, and should it ever wear out, I'll be looking for the same brand to replace it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: IS THE BEE’S KNEES!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is used every morning now. Just love. A few chopped veggies, a bit of turkey ham or sausage, liquid or shelled beaten eggs and two minutes latter it’s ready. Add cheese and close back up for a few minutes Also add some sour cream and salsa at this time. No need to cook any more heat inside cooker melts cheese This is one of the I can’t do without kitchen goodies.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: New favorite kitchen gadget!
customer_reviews.text: The best invention EVER! I love tortilla española but it took so long to make when cooking the eggs and potatoes stovetop to perfection. The first time I tried it, the tortilla came out perfect! Three thumbs up from me and my daughters. I took the advice of other reviewers and cooked at 70% power in my 1100W microwave.
customer_reviews.author: S. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Just a mess waiting to happen!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for work, hoping it would be an easy way to make a hot meal for lunch. I was terribly mistaken. The directions are long (in several languages) and jump around, making them extremely hard to follow. Furthermore, no matter how many times I tried or how gentle I was, the eggs leaked out or overflowed. I spent more time cleaning up egg mess then enjoying any eggs.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Neat
customer_reviews.text: I love this. Now I can make my Weight Watcher’s omelet without splattering up the stove top. The little booklet has great ideas. I use cooking spray, cook the veggies for a couple of minutes, and then the egg mixture.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn A. Shivers

customer_reviews.title: Fast and easy tortilla española! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love Tortilla Española but have never had much success in making it in a regular frying pan (everything falls apart during the flipover part), plus it's always been a very time-consuming process. So I thought I'd give this Lekue Spanish Omelet/Frittata Maker a try, and I'm so glad I did! It came with a recipe that was incredibly fast and easy to make in the microwave, and it came out perfect and delicious! Plus it's super easy to clean. I love it, and you will, too!
customer_reviews.author: MDR

customer_reviews.title: You'll get slimed...
customer_reviews.text: Over time, and not a long time, this product leached a significant amount of slimy material that can't be good for you. I've thrown mine away, and am sorry I ever purchased it, and worse yet...ate dishes prepared in it. I would recommend you avoid this product.
customer_reviews.author: Pugalesco

customer_reviews.title: so perfect. This hepls food in the microwave actually taste ...
customer_reviews.text: So simple , so perfect. This hepls food in the microwave actually taste good , keeps burrito soft, makes great omelettes, steams vegetables. I started buying these for gifts . I’m always looking for ways to stop lifting pans and using stove, due to arthritis and minor burns and this solved all of those issue!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Win win!
customer_reviews.text: This tool is amazing for getting a healthy breakfast cooked in a hurry before I leave for work. It washes up fast and requires no watching while I'm getting ready (as traditional skillets do), So far, I've come up with about 3 recipes that I enjoy very much. 1 sweet, 1 spicy and 1 savory. Handy! Cleans up well! Makes mornings easier and more efficient! Oh, and it saves me money when it comes to eating breakfast!
customer_reviews.author: tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Love all their cookware but this is a perfect everyday size
customer_reviews.text: Great size for omlettes too. The omlette maker size I was always over filling and everything was squishing out when I closed it because of the way it was shaped. But NOT with this one. This is the PERFECT size. You can throw tons of meat, cheese and raw veggies inside. I also use it to steam vegetables. Also did fish in it.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Friend

customer_reviews.title: Delivered 1 hour ago- used it twice already! Ham ...
customer_reviews.text: Delivered 1 hour ago- used it twice already! Ham, 3 eggs, 2 tbs milk. 3 minutes flip then 1 minute. No mess! Teenagers can do it themselves when home alone without turning on stove. Bonus.
customer_reviews.author: LMH

customer_reviews.title: This omelet maker works OK but I don't use it ...
customer_reviews.text: This omelet maker works OK but I don't use it as much as I thought I would because it is a little messy to use. I do put a plate under it to avoid having omelet mixture run onto the microwave turntable.
customer_reviews.author: Carol M. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Products is great so far I only used it twice still trying to get the timing of how long to make the frittata just trial and error
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: I like the idea
customer_reviews.text: It is too flexible. I like the idea, but would be better made in a harder material
customer_reviews.author: Dazz

customer_reviews.title: Not a good tool
customer_reviews.text: Messy and makes bad omelets - went in the donation box after being used only twice.
customer_reviews.author: Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't get any better than this.
customer_reviews.text: Lekue has some of the most creative and innovative cooking utensils. We love this Frittata microwave product. It is so convenient, fast and eggs come out PERFECT overtime. Checkout their rice cooker.
customer_reviews.author: Dorleen Okinaga Ayers

customer_reviews.title: A great invention
customer_reviews.text: Excellent . Lekue products are useful, easy to use and work amazingly well. They speed up cooking, Do an excellent job.
customer_reviews.author: Smart Shopper

product_meta.title: Lekue Spanish Omelet/Frittata Maker, Model #
product_meta.description: Fall in love with healthy, easy cooking with the most innovative products thanks to Lekue. Quality, functionality and design that will surprise you with a wide range of tools to make cooking, preparation, preservation, baking and freezing easier. With this Spanish Omelet, Lekue provides practical and revolutionary solutions for today's society way of cooking. Spanish omelet is a mold designed to cook round shaped dishes required two sided cooking, making the process more comfortable and easier than ever. Have delicious Spanish omelets, frittatas and much more, in the microwave. 1) Add the ingredients to the Spanish omelet mold 2) Close and cook in the microwave. Note that the time and power level may vary depending on the microwave. To transport, hold the mold by the handles and gently pull outwards. 3) Without opening it, press down on the top of the Spanish omelet to remove the air and turn over using the handles. 4) Cook in the microwave again for the time specified by the recipe. 5) Remove from microwave. When opening, be careful not to burn yourself with the steam inside. Serve. Recommendations: wash the product before its first use. Microwave, oven and dishwasher safe. Do not use the product directly over an open flame or heat source. To un-mold easily, lightly grease the mold on first uses. Allow to cool for a few seconds after cooking. Do not use the grill position in the microwave. When using a traditional over, place the mold in the lower part. Do not use scouring pads or abrasive soap for washing. Do not use sharp objects. Maximum capacity is 28 fluid ounces.
feature_bullets: Make a variety of dishes including Frittata, Okonomiyaki, Jeon or even pancakes in just 10 minutes
Hinge ensures closing position avoids losing parts and performs as a handle
Turns over easily without any risk and using just one utensil
Great, attractive design based on scientific research on the best way to cook an omelet
Microwave and dishwasher safe; Made with 100% platinum silicone

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
